meanings.definition: The quality or state of being concrete.
meanings.sent1: The concreteness of the sidewalk made it easy to walk on.
meanings.sent2: Her explanation lacked concreteness, leaving us confused.
meanings.sent3: The concreteness of the cake batter made it impossible to pour smoothly.
meanings.sent4: His concreteness in decision-making was like a solid rock in the storm of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The concreteness of the mountain peak against the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The quality of being clear, definite, and specific.
meanings.sent1: The concreteness of the instructions helped us complete the task easily.
meanings.sent2: The concreteness of her argument left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: The concreteness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The concreteness of his love for her was evident in every gesture.
meanings.sent5: The concreteness of the map guided us through the maze of streets.
